text: Ranjit Singh Dhillon is an Indian politician from the state of Punjab and a member of the Punjab Legislative Assembly. ==Constituency== Dhillon represents the Ludhiana East Assembly Constituency of Punjab. ==Political Party== Dhillon is a member of Shiromani Akali Dal. == References == ==External links== * Member of Legislative Assembly * Leader Bio - Ranjit Singh Dhillon Category:People from Punjab, India Category:Shiromani Akali Dal politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ranjit Singh Dhillon
